passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > form:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(15) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > iframe
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(5) > h6:nth-child(1)
